thread.title: BRIEF-Asian Mineral Resources Update On Strategic Review For Ban Phuc Nickel Mine In Vietnam

title: BRIEF-Asian Mineral Resources Update On Strategic Review For Ban Phuc Nickel Mine In Vietnam

organizations.name: ban phuc nickel mine in vietnam reuters

text:
April 16, 2018 / 5:46 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Asian Mineral Resources Update On Strategic Review For Ban Phuc Nickel Mine In Vietnam Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Asian Mineral Resources Ltd: 
* ASIAN MINERAL RESOURCES UPDATE ON STRATEGIC REVIEW FOR BAN PHUC NICKEL MINE IN VIETNAM AND ANNOUNCEMENT OF FINANCING AGREEMENT 
* ASIAN MINERAL RESOURCES - STRATEGIC DISCUSSIONS WITH BAN PHUC NICKEL MINE HAVE NOT BEEN SUCCESSFUL TO DATE & MAY NOT BE SUCCESSFUL GOING FORWARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
